name: Everlasting Summer: Rolls, kefir and rock and roll
name_original: Everlasting Summer: Rolls, kefir and rock and roll
description:
As soon as the hero got used to the camp a little, a new misfortune happens: a concert at the closing of the shift under the threat of a breakdown, and all through his fault. The group needs a new bassist, and the music circle makes Semyon an offer that cannot be refused. And he would not want to, because Miku will personally take care of his training.

The story is funny, sometimes funny, frivolous and musical, like Miku herself.

Waiting for you:
- a lot of new content;
- new events and characters;
- summer, pioneer romance and music.
